questions.title: What does continue do?
questions.description:
# Description
The advantage of using for loops over `Array.prototype.forEach` is that it allows you to use `break` and `continue`, but why do we need them.
# Notes
If you don't now that you won't get accepted bear that in mind!
```js
const name = "yosef";
const state = "umemployed"
```

choices.value: Breaks the current iteration and transfers to the other without continuing the code in the current iteration.
